short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The homepage for the AI enthusiasts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking to upgrade your new tab experience? Want instant access to the latest AI tools and updates? First Stop is here for you!

Key Features:
- Quickly access top AI tools directly from your new tab—no more searching for URLs or typing queries.
- Stay informed with daily updates on AI news, so you’re always in the loop.

I'm continuously improving First Stop, and would love your feedback! If you have any ideas or suggestions, please email me at hello@minjie.design. Here are some ideas I have got for future updates:
- Easy access to a selection of popular AI tools
- Customisable list for your favorite AI tools
- A showcase of the latest AI-generated artworks
